title: Mankind Pharma forays into agri-tech space - Economic Times
content: Mankind Pharma forays into agri-tech space  Economic Times
description: Mankind Pharma will its foray into the agri-tech segment, with plans to invest up to Rs 200 crore in the first two to three years. The company has set up a new arm Mankind Agritech Pvt Ltd, which will offer a variety of crop care solutions to Indian farmers, including weedicides, insecticides, fungicides, plant growth regulators and biologicals
